mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vote_records (option_id, value, created_at, updated_at, vote_id, user_id) VALUES (#{optionId},#{value},#{createAt},#{updateAt},#{voteId},#{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT vote_records.id,vote_records.option_id,vote_records.vote_id,vote_records.value,created_at,updated_at,user_id,title FROM vote_records,problem_options WHERE vote_records.vote_id = #{voteId} and user_id = #{userId} and vote_records.vote_id = problem_options.vote_id
